title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Skills: Remote Education Effectiveness Analysis and Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three technological and pedagogical factors influencing remote education design.
Learners can apply a process for measuring remote education effectiveness through online survey design and analysis.
Learners can derive factors influencing remote education satisfaction based on learner characteristics (age, background).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
